name: Sofia Rodrigues
title: Founder & CEO
description: Sofia's dream of bringing authentic Amazonian açaí to Aracaju has become a reality with Purple Cream. Her passion for quality and healthy living drives the company's vision.

name: João Santos
title: Operations Manager
description: With a keen eye for logistics and a commitment to efficiency, João ensures that every ingredient is fresh and every operation runs smoothly, from sourcing to serving.

name: Carolina Souza
title: Brand & Design Manager
description: Carolina is the artistic mind behind our enchanting bowl presentations and engaging customer experience. Her creativity adds a unique touch to every aspect of our brand.

name: Daniel Costa
title: Supply Chain & Logistics Manager
description: Daniel is the mastermind behind our logistics. He manages the journey of our açaí from the Amazon to all our stores, ensuring every ingredient is sustainably sourced and delivered fresh.

name: Camila Ferreira
title: Human Resources Manager
description: Camila is dedicated to building our amazing team. She manages recruitment, training, and development programs, ensuring that our staff feels valued and empowered across all branches.

name: Thiago Oliveira
title: IT Systems Administrator
description: Thiago is our tech guru who manages our point-of-sale systems, network security, and internal tech infrastructure, guaranteeing that our operations run efficiently and securely every day.

name: Fernanda Lima
title: Finance Manager
description: Fernanda oversees the financial health of our franchise network. She manages budgeting, financial planning, and analyzes performance to ensure sustainable growth and profitability for all our partners.

name: Lucas Gonçalves
title: Digital Marketing Specialist
description: Lucas drives our online presence and customer engagement. He creates and manages our digital advertising campaigns and social media strategies to bring the taste of our açaí to a wider audience.
